# SSM Sample Messages for Testing
# Format: IATA Standard Schedule Messages (SSM)
# These are real-world examples for testing the SSM Parser Agent

# ==============================================================================
# NEW - New Flight Schedules
# ==============================================================================

# Copa Airlines PTY-MIA daily Boeing 737-800
NEW CM 0100 J PTY MIA 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 0715 0945 0230 E0 M JP

# Copa Airlines PTY-JFK daily Boeing 737-800
NEW CM 0201 J PTY JFK 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 0830 1445 0615 E0 M JP

# American Airlines MIA-JFK daily Airbus A321
NEW AA 0001 J MIA JFK 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 321 0700 1015 0315 E0 B JP

# Delta Air Lines ATL-LAX daily Boeing 737-900
NEW DL 0100 J ATL LAX 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 73H 0930 1145 0415 E0 M JP

# Overnight flight (arrives next day)
NEW UA 0890 J SFO SYD 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 77W 2200 0630 1030 E+1 M JP

# Weekday-only service
NEW WN 1234 J LAS PHX 123456X 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 0800 1015 0215 E0 S JP

# Tue/Thu/Sat service
NEW B6 0567 J JFK LAX X2X4X6X 1DEC24 31MAR25 32B 0900 1230 0630 E0 M JP

# ==============================================================================
# TIM - Time Changes
# ==============================================================================

# Depart 10 minutes later
TIM CM 0100 J PTY MIA 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 0725 0955

# Significant time change
TIM AA 0001 J MIA JFK 1234567 15JAN25 15JAN25 0730 1045

# Time change for specific date range
TIM DL 0100 J ATL LAX 1234567 20JAN25 25JAN25 1000 1215

# ==============================================================================
# EQT - Equipment Changes
# ==============================================================================

# Change from 738 to 73J (Boeing 737 MAX 8)
EQT CM 0100 PTY MIA 1234567 1FEB25 28FEB25 73J

# Change from A321 to A320
EQT AA 0001 MIA JFK 1234567 10FEB25 15FEB25 320

# Upgrade to larger aircraft
EQT DL 0100 ATL LAX 1234567 1MAR25 15MAR25 77W

# ==============================================================================
# CNL - Cancellations
# ==============================================================================

# Cancel specific dates (holiday week)
CNL CM 0100 PTY MIA 1234567 24DEC24 26DEC24

# Cancel single day
CNL AA 0001 MIA JFK 1234567 15JAN25 15JAN25

# Cancel extended period (maintenance)
CNL DL 0100 ATL LAX 1234567 1FEB25 7FEB25

# ==============================================================================
# CON - Continuation/Restore
# ==============================================================================

# Restore previously cancelled flights
CON CM 0100 PTY MIA 1234567 27DEC24 31DEC24

# Resume service after maintenance
CON DL 0100 ATL LAX 1234567 8FEB25 28FEB25

# ==============================================================================
# RPL - Replace
# ==============================================================================

# Complete replacement of schedule
RPL CM 0202 J PTY SJO 1234567 1FEB25 31MAR25 738 1030 1145 0115 E0 S JP

# ==============================================================================
# SKD - Schedule Dump Request
# ==============================================================================

# Request all schedules for PTY
SKD CM PTY 1DEC24 31MAR25

# Request all schedules for MIA
SKD AA MIA 1DEC24 31MAR25

# ==============================================================================
# Edge Cases
# ==============================================================================

# Multi-day offset (arrives 2 days later - long-haul)
NEW QF 0008 J LAX MEL 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 380 2300 0700 1500 E+2 M JP

# Flight with suffix
NEW CM 0100A J PTY MIA 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 1500 1730 0230 E0 S JP

# Minimum connection time test
NEW CM 0301 J PTY BOG 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 0600 0715 0115 E0 M JP
NEW CM 0302 J BOG PTY 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 0900 1015 0115 E0 M JP

# Red-eye flight
NEW AS 0200 J SEA JFK X2X4X6X 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 2330 0745 0515 E+1 M JP

# ==============================================================================
# Invalid Messages (for error testing)
# ==============================================================================

# Missing required fields
# NEW CM 0100 PTY MIA

# Invalid airport code
# NEW CM 0100 J XXX MIA 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 0715 0945

# Invalid date format
# NEW CM 0100 J PTY MIA 1234567 01/12/24 31/03/25 738 0715 0945

# Invalid operating days
# NEW CM 0100 J PTY MIA 12X4567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 0715 0945

# Invalid time format
# NEW CM 0100 J PTY MIA 1234567 1DEC24 31MAR25 738 7:15 9:45
